long_description: This tough 'n' light THOMSON All-Mountain Carbon mountain bike handlebar is strong enough for all-mountain and freeride missions and light enough for racing. Carbon construction uses 3 different fiber types to optimize stiffness and flex for performance and comfort. Built for sturdy resilience, the handlebar uses a tailor-made resin for very high impact resistance. Ends of bar use a 1.5K weave to prevent damage to unidirectional carbon fibers within main body of handlebar, whether from an impact or shortening the handlebar. Center clamping area is precisely refined to match with 31.8mm stems. THOMSON All-Mountain Carbon handlebar is 730mm wide with a 12mm rise; enjoy a 6deg backsweep and 4deg upsweep.
short_description: This tough 'n' light THOMSON All-Mountain Carbon mountain bike handlebar is strong enough for all-mountain and freeride missions and light enough for racing.
